mapper.insert: INSERT INTO test.board ( TITLE, CONTENTS, REG_ID, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{contents}, #{regId}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE test.board SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENTS=#{contents}, REG_DT=now(), MOD_ID=#{modId}, MOD_DT=now() WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ , TITLE AS title, CONTENTS AS contents, VIEWS AS views, REG_ID AS regId, REG_DT AS regDt, MOD_ID AS modId, MOD_DT AS modDt FROM test.board WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
